If anyone has any questions, ask them.

text: Eğer yoksa toy bittikten sonra herkes uykuya
english: If you don't, everyone goes to sleep after they're young.

english: When it's pulled, we'll take action for the raid.
Sir

The pleasure is all ours.

Thank God he's all right.
You're welcome, too.
Here you go.

text: Tekrardan hoş gelmiş, toyumuzu şereflendirmişsiniz Candar Bey
english: Welcome back, Mr. Candar. You have honored our young man.
The survivors are not separate.
They're all ours.

text: O şeref bize ait Ertuğrul Bey
english: The honor is ours, Mr. Ertugrul.
Our lives are saved.

text: Şimdi sıra geldi çıbanın başını almaya
english: Now it's time to take the boil's head

text: Şu kız konuşmadı mı hâlâ? Bir haber bekledim ama
english: Did that girl talk to you yet?
I let her go, Mr. Candar.
Forgive me, Mr. Ertugrul, but why?
She's innocent.
All he knows is what he told Mr. Aliyar
Thanks to him, our lives are saved.

text: At izi, it izine karıştı Ertuğrul Bey
english: The horse's trail is mixed with the dog's trail, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Her açılan kapıdan bir bela gelir
english: There's trouble coming through every door that opens
Let him come, Mr. Candar.
We'll be trouble where there's trouble
Sir

text: Beyim, Haçaturyan Usta sizinle görüşmek ister
english: Sir, the Crusader Master would like to see you.
Have him meet Mr. Artuk.
Yes, sir.

text: Elimizde ne bir ipucu var ne de bir tanık var Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: We don't have a clue, we don't have a witness, Mr. Ertugrul.
One way or another
Who's behind this?
Or whoever it is.
♪ Into their dens ♪
I'm gonna make you throw up what you're eating.
Thanks.

text: Aramızda yanlış anlaşılmalar olsa da söz konusu obalarımız ve varlığımızsa
english: Even though there are misunderstandings between us, it's about our obas and our existence.

text: sonuna kadar ardında olduğumuzu bilesin Ertuğrul Bey
english: I want you to know that we're behind you until the end, Mr. Ertugrul.
Mr. Ertugrul says it's true.
In fact, he says it's missing.

text: Biz bundan gayrı iki ayrı oba değiliz
english: We're not two separate obas from each other.
Single oba

text: Ondan da öte kaygıları aynı olan bir aileyiz
english: More than that, we're a family with the same concerns.
Sir
You're allowed, huh?
Here you are, Mr. Crusader.

text: Hayrola Haçaturyan Efendi bir aksilik mi vardır?
english: What's wrong with the Crusader Master?
Sir, I know you said not to come to the room.
But I had to come.

text: Dere o kadar cömert çıktık ki
english: We came out of the creek so generous.

text: bu kadar az vakitte bir kese doldurdum
english: I've filled a pouch in such a short amount of time.
But it's hard to keep the gold

text: Hem bu güzel haberi vereyim hem de altınları size teslim edeyim dedim
english: I thought I'd give you the good news and give you the gold.
May you exist, Lord Crusader.
Good for you. Good for you.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im bu habere çok sevinecek
english: Mr. Ertugrul will be very happy about this.

text: Böyle giderse de sayende kesemiz altınla dolup taşacak inşallah
english: At this rate, we'll be full of gold thanks to you.

text: Aman beyim, Tanrı'nın yardımı sizlerin sayesinde
english: Oh, my lord, God's help is thanks to you.
I'm just a simple middleman.

text: Haçaturyan Usta, sen çalışmaya devam edesin
english: Master Crusader, keep working.
And don't come to the room unless you have to.

text: Tez vakit azığını tamamlayıp, kimselere görünmeden madene geri dönesin
english: When you're done, you'll be back in the mine before anyone sees you.

text: Sen hiç merak buyurma Artuk Bey'im
english: Don't worry about it, Mr. Artuk.
We're almost back to our Oba, son.
Soon our suffering will be over
Let's find out.
Who's the spy in this sultan's palace?
Shh, shh, shh!
Calm down, Serhat Shh!
Shh!

text: Belli ki sen benden daha heveslisin obaya dönmeye, ha?
english: You're obviously more eager to go back to the obama than I am, huh?
But there's still time.
This letter will get us back to the Obama.
Just be patient.
Just be patient.
Patience

text: Turgut konusunda sana ettiğim lafları hak etmedin
english: You didn't deserve what I told you about Turgut.
Forgive me.
You've given him a lot of work.
He'd be dead if it wasn't for you.
I wish I'd let him die.
He's gonna die.
I promise you, brother.
You're going to kill him.
But first he'll kill Ertugrul.
Welcome, Turgut Alp.
Thank you, brother.

text: Şimdi gidip Ertuğrul Bey'ime bir mesele olduğunu söyleyesin
english: Now you go tell Mr. Ertugrul there's something going on.
I need to see him.
Good-bye.

text: Bu da babam Süleyman Şah'ın beylik kılıcı
english: This is the sword of my father, Solomon Shah.
Damascus steel
The sword isn't the one who did it.
The hand that holds it is valued by its name.
Look.

text: Bu da babam Yinal Bey'den mirastır
english: This is my father's legacy from Mr. Yinal.
That's Damascus steel.
It'll be left to our sons too, I hope.

text: Demek Süleyman Şah'ın Horasan'dan Şam'a kadar
english: So Suleyman Shah's Horasan to Damascus

english: This is the sword that enters the infidel into the sky and turns out to be red.

Yeah.
It's sharper than a line of lies.
Mahir's a master, I can tell.
The sword is the double-water eater.

english: Double-water-eating iron is very strong.
It's solid. It's solid.

Mr. Ertugrul
I brought up my sons.
My intentions are good.

Mr. Ertugrul

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

Sir

Don't mention it, Mr. Ertuğrul.
Sir
My dear brother, you're welcome.
We welcome you, my lord.
What's with the letter?
Simon.
To Sultan Alaeddin's spy in his palace.
You've done well, Turgut.
Knowledge is the greatest power
Thank you, sir.
We'll raid the inn after they're young.

text: Bunca zamandır bundan daha iyi haber işitmedim
english: I haven't heard any better news in all this time.
Now, if you'll excuse me, my absence.
Godspeed, my Turgut.
Thank you, sir.
We met with Abu Nakkaş. His intentions are clear.

english: Make Sultan Alaeddin unable to rule the country and take over the throne.

Ural!

Nothing important, I hope.
I don't.

english: From now on, we're young and we're married.
